name: The Square Desktop Version
description:
Alpha just had a massive graphics fix.

You play as Square, the goal beat all the levels before the timer runs out (1 hour)

Power ups/downs

day and night cycle real time

random weather effects.

If you enjoyed at all please support this development, and bring your friends to play.

Please note the desktop version features the save/load but the web version does not.

UPDATE:

Graphically better, engine improved.

The Square is a wip of a platform puzzler

FEATURES:

14 Levels (so far)
Randome weather cycle
Changing backgrounds dependant on the time of day you play.
Power ups/downs that help or hinder your progress.
Tight controls.

Desktop version can be supplied on request:

Gamepad integration
Game save and load feature.

The goal is to beat all the levels in under 1 hour.

CONTROLS:

left/right arrow keys - move left right
space bar - jump
escape - return to menu
P - pause
R - reset level
C - Cheat (skip level) this will brake the game at the minute if you skip level 14.

POWER PILLS:

Blue - super jump
Red - Heavy player
Salmon - Reverse Horizontal movement
Yellow - No gravity
Pink - Super speed
Dark Green - Rock switch
Grey - Gravity reverse.
